member.name: T:ExaminationSystem.ExamMode
member.summary: Enum to represent the exam mode.

member.name: T:ExaminationSystem.Student
member.summary: Represents a student who can receive notifications.

member.name: T:ExaminationSystem.Subject
member.summary: Represents the subject associated with an exam.

member.name: T:ExaminationSystem.QuestionList
member.summary: Represents a list of questions with file logging.

member.name: T:ExaminationSystem.FinalExam
member.summary: Final exam class that shows answers after finishing.

member.name: T:ExaminationSystem.Program
member.summary: Main program to test the exam system.
